radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued reduction in bone mineral density with lumbar z-scores of -3.8 at age 15 years 5 months and -4.3 at age 23 years 3 months.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Z-score of -4.3 at lumbar spine and -2.9 at femoral neck.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued reduction in bone mineral density.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Persistence of enlarged ovaries with bilateral ovarian cysts.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Mean ovarian volume in six of seven ultrasounds over eight years ranged from 38.2 - 123.7 cm3, with normal being < 20 cm3.
